html:
Like a river, and - like a flowing stream "Like the great river, and like the overflowing stream"— ,That is, the Euphrates, (it ought to have been pointed ,כנהר ,cannahar ,, ut fluvius ille ,, as the river), and the Nile.

,

Then shall ye suck "And ye shall suck at the breast"— ,These two words ,שד על ,al shad ,, at the breast, seem to have been omitted in the present text, from their likeness to the two words following; ,צד על ,al tsad ,, at the side. A very probable conjecture of Houbigant. The Chaldee and Vulgate have omitted the two latter words instead of the two former. See note on Isaiah 60:4 ; (note).

,
